Title: Senior Data Analyst - Grow & Engage
Description:
We are seeking an organised and self-motivated Senior Data Analyst to work embedded in our Grow & Engage domain, one of our cross-functional areas to help shape the development of one of the world's leading FinTech products. In this role, you will also have the opportunity to lead, mentor, and coach other analysts, fostering a culture of collaboration and continuous learning within the team.

About The Opportunity

As a Senior Data Analyst you will enable our Product & Business Segments (Acquire, Memberships and Engagement) in the Growth and Engage domain to make data-driven decisions. You are here to establish a data-mindset and thereby to foster a culture of continuous learning and improvement. You will work in a cross functional setup, working closely with other analysts, engineers, designers, and product managers.

In This Role, You Will


Help us set the right goals: Develop clear and measurable targets based on an initiativesâ€™ scope.
Be a strategic partner for Senior Leadership: Driving end to end high complexity analysis on a strategic level in which the business domain is critical to drive overall company success.
Handle stakeholders: Be an internal go-to-person for your teams when it comes to data related questions.
Evaluate initiatives: Support Product experimentation & testing initiatives; design test plans, obtain cross-functional alignment, execute robust analysis, and deliver actionable insights. Share these learnings through clear documentation and concise and empathic communication.
Contribute to self-serve data platform: Help building the right analytics foundations ,by pairing up with technical peers, so our product and business teams can interact with data and extract the right insights themselves.
Provide monitoring tools: Build the dashboards your team looks at every week to make sure they are impacting our company OKRs.
Improve data literacy of organisation: Educate teams to become independent when it comes to data access and understanding function led training and team wide workshops to foster data driven culture.
Be part of our data-community: Collaborate with a broad range of analytics teams at N26 to utilise shared platforms, insights and innovations.
Lead, mentor, and coach other analysts, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented team environment.
Support some of the following product & business team initiatives (not limited to):
You support your team in discovery of new product ideas, identifying user friction points and business opportunities.
Evaluate your teamsâ€™ continuous releases making sure they are delivering on business goals via experimental or observational methods.
Collaborate with UX researchers to combine qualitative and quantitative research for better product hypotheses.
During product development you make sure all data needed for future evaluation is being captured through set up of tracking events or as part of the backend service.
Drive the quantitative analysis on your segment, being responsible for the insights and business discovery on the team.

Background

What you need to be successful:

4+ years of relevant experience, ideally within the Product or Analytics field.

Skills


Strong understanding of statistical methods used in the analysis of experimental and observational data.
Highly experienced with SQL and Python/R for analytics
Experience working with one or more common data visualisation tools (Tableau, Metabase, Looker, Superset, etc)
Good presentation skills and communication skills.
Having experience in high growth startups managing topics like acquisition, engagement or subscription would be a plus.
Having experience in quantitative research would be a plus.
Having experience in fintech would be a plus.


Whatâ€™s In It For You


Accelerate your career growth by joining one of Europeâ€™s most talked about disruptors ðŸš€.
Employee benefits that range from a competitive personal development budget, work from home budget, discounts to fitness & wellness memberships, language apps and public transportation.
Come together with your team in the office for a dedicated day of teamwork each week, plus another day of your choice, and enjoy the flexibility of remote work the rest of the time. Some roles may require additional in-office presence.
As an N26 employee you will have access to a Premium subscription on your personal N26 bank account. As well as subscriptions for friends and family members.
Additional day of annual leave for each year of service.
A high degree of autonomy and access to cutting edge technologies - all while working with a friendly team of peers of diverse nationalities, life experiences and family statuses.
A relocation package with visa support for those who need it.


Who We Are

N26 has reimagined banking for todayâ€™s digital world. Technology and design empower everything we do and itâ€™s how we are building the global banking platform the world loves to use.

We've eliminated physical branches, paperwork, and hidden fees for an elegant digital experience and supreme savings. Giving people the power to live and bank their way is what gets us out of bed in the morning and inspires the work that we do.

We are headquartered in Berlin with offices in multiple cities across Europe, including Vienna and Barcelona, and a 1,500-strong team of more than 80 nationalities.

Sounds good? Apply now for this position.

Equal Opportunities

We recognize that our strength lies in our people and the varied perspectives they bring to our workforce. We strive to build talented and diverse teams to drive our business success and empower our people to reach their full potential.

We genuinely welcome and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds, cultures, genders, sexual orientations, abilities, neurodiversities, and ages. We're committed to creating an inclusive workspace where everyone feels valued and respected, free from harassment and discrimination. If there's anything you need to make the application process work for you, please let us know by reaching out to candidate.exp@n26.com.

Visit our website to learn more about Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion at N26.
Show more

  • Additional day of annual leave for each year of service.
  • A high degree of autonomy and access to cutting edge technologies - all while working with a friendly team of peers of diverse nationalities, life experiences and family statuses.
  • A relocation package with visa support for those who need it.

Who We Are

N26 has reimagined banking for todayâ€™s digital world. Technology and design empower everything we do and itâ€™s how we are building the global banking platform the world loves to use.

We've eliminated physical branches, paperwork, and hidden fees for an elegant digital experience and supreme savings. Giving people the power to live and bank their way is what gets us out of bed in the morning and inspires the work that we do.

We are headquartered in Berlin with offices in multiple cities across Europe, including Vienna and Barcelona, and a 1,500-strong team of more than 80 nationalities.

Sounds good? Apply now for this position.

Equal Opportunities

We recognize that our strength lies in our people and the varied perspectives they bring to our workforce. We strive to build talented and diverse teams to drive our business success and empower our people to reach their full potential.

We genuinely welcome and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds, cultures, genders, sexual orientations, abilities, neurodiversities, and ages. We're committed to creating an inclusive workspace where everyone feels valued and respected, free from harassment and discrimination. If there's anything you need to make the application process work for you, please let us know by reaching out to candidate.exp@n26.com.

Visit our website to learn more about Diversity, Equity, & Inclusion at N26.

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Marketing Analytics
Description:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, people from all over the world have booked more than 200 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 800 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team mission

The Analytics team's mission is to enable the organisation to take action based on data. We work on a variety of problems and datasets as members of cross-functional mission teams. We take ownership of the entire analytics funnel, from exploration through recommendations to impact measurement, and take pride in the insights we generate.

This specific position is within our Marketing Analytics (Attribution & Paid Search) and will focus mostly on helping optimize our Paid Search operations and scaling our investments towards the most incremental and loyal customers. The analyst will need to intervene in our campaign setup and bidding strategies and our attribution and experimentation solutions.

You Will


Develop quantitative analysis and statistical models to evaluate and steer marketing decisions
Maintain and improve our marketing measurement tools (Attribution, experimentation framework, Customer lifetime valueâ€¦)
Explore large datasets, give meaning to data and numbers, identify opportunities and issues, and present findings to stakeholders
Develop new methodologies to scale our Display and Partnerships channel, among others
Serve as a liaison between the marketing teams and the data engineering team
Mentor others in the skills needed for this role


Who You Are


5+ years of relevant experience interpreting data in an analytics, data science or business intelligence role
Strong knowledge of SQL and Python for analysis (eg, pandas, scikit-learn, pyspark)
Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers and a track record in sharing insights to business stakeholders
Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks, Databricks)
Prior exposure to digital and performance marketing
Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction and with highly engaged individuals
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English


Nice to have


Knowledge or previous experience of attribution and paid search.
Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus


How We Set You Up For Success


Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences
A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
English-speaking office environment
Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
Well-stocked kitchen and team-building events like our famous pizza & beer Fridays
GetYourGuide vouchers and free German lessons
Relocation assistance if needed


And more...

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.

Title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst â€“ Central Reporting (f/m/x)
Description:
Company Description

Our goal is a solar power system on every roof, a storage unit in every house, and an e-car in every garage. How are we achieving this? Enpal makes solar easy: we rent out solar power systems, electricity storage and wallboxes at an all-inclusive rate, supplemented by a low-cost green electricity tariff, and intelligently networked into an integrated overall solution.

We are just at the beginning of our journey to becoming Europe's largest energy company. That's why we're looking for talented people to accompany us on this journey, leave their footprint and celebrate successes together with us. At Enpal, you will find a dynamic working environment as well as the space to develop yourself personally and professionally and to use your strengths effectively.

As the first green unicorn in Germany and the fastest-growing energy company in Europe (FT1000 Ranking 2022 by Financial Times & Statista), we continue to advance our mission of green energy for everyone. Be part of this success story and change the world with us!

Job Description


Strategic Partnership: Collaborate with the VP of Financial BI, VP of FP&A, and C-Suite leadership to align business intelligence strategies with financial goals. Work cross-functionally with Marketing, Sales, and Finance to deliver data-driven insights that support business growth and operational efficiency.
Project Ownership: Manage the intake and prioritization of data projects, ensuring clear goals, scope, and expected impact. Work with stakeholders to refine requirements, prioritize initiatives, and drive execution in alignment with business objectives.
End-to-End Data Solutions: Own the full lifecycle of data solutions, from scoping and MVP development to data modeling, implementation, and validation. Work closely with data engineers, analysts, and business leaders to ensure solutions are scalable and fit-for-purpose.
Data Visualization & Dashboarding: Develop effective, actionable dashboards and data products that translate complex data into clear, intuitive insights. Apply best practices in data visualization to communicate key information effectively across all levels, from operational teams to executive leadership.
Data-Driven Decision Making: Conduct ad-hoc analyses and exploratory data work to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Provide proactive recommendations that drive business performance and ensure ongoing monitoring of key metrics.
Enhancing Data Culture: Elevate analytical standards and best practices within the organization. Share knowledge, refine methodologies, and stay up to date with the latest BI, data visualization, and analytics trends.



Qualifications


5+ years of experience in business intelligence, data analytics, or a related field, with a strong understanding of customer acquisition, finance, and business performance drivers.
Technical expertise in SQL, ETL processes, and BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or similar. Our stack includes dbt, Snowflake, Streamlit, and Tableau.
Strong data visualization and dashboarding skills, with the ability to create clear, intuitive, and actionable insights from complex datasets.
Experience with Python or R for data analysis is a plus, particularly in advanced forecasting methods (e.g., econometrics, time series analysis).
Proven problem-solving skills, with experience in automating reporting workflows and leveraging data to improve decision-making.
Strong collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to engage business, analytics, and engineering teams to drive impactful solutions.
Ability to present data products and insights effectively to stakeholders at all management levels



Additional Information

At Enpal, we are proud of the diversity of our team. No decisions are made based on skin color, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, or age, either during recruitment or employment. We strongly encourage women, neurodivergent people, people of color, and LGBTQ(+) people to apply. Enpal stands for a safe workplace and takes action against discrimination and harassment of any kind.
Show more

Title: Marketing Data Analyst (all genders)
Description:
This is femtasy

femtasy is the audio-only streaming platform for erotica centering women and their experiences. We inspire women to explore and enjoy on their own terms; simple as that. We stand for zest for life â€“ empowering women is in our DNA. We are pioneering a product designed with inclusivity in mind, are led by a visionary woman CEO & Founder, and have a team that is over 90% women+ and gender-diverse individuals. We have already positively impacted the lives of hundreds of thousands of women by re-defining pleasure and are just getting started.

How we work is just as important to us as what we work on. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re committed to building a progressive, forward-thinking company culture. Learn more in the 'benefits' section.

Your Mission

We are seeking a technically-skilled Marketing Data Analyst who will turn our performance marketing data into actionable insights. This role bridges marketing and data â€” from implementing tracking setups and managing attribution logic to building dashboards and spotting trends across Meta, Google, and TikTok.

Your Responsibilities


Handling data transparency from campaign to ad level (including sign-up and post-trial behavior tracking leading to ROAS)
Optimizing the tech and data set-up across ad tools, particularly Meta
Providing insights into areas of growth and opportunity
Building out reporting frameworks to help us make better data-driven decisions across all channels (Meta, Google, TikTok, YouTube)
Potentially assisting in the analysis for native app communication once that project is underway in the next 6-12 months.
Own and optimize our tracking setup (incl. GA4, Meta CAPI, GTM, server-side tracking).
Write SQL queries to analyze campaign performance and build self-serve dashboards.
Collaborate with Tech and BI teams to ensure clean and reliable marketing data infrastructure.
Use tools like Looker, BigQuery, or similar to generate insights and reports.


Role Specific Requirements

Weâ€™re looking for someone who:


3+ years of experience in a marketing-focused data analytics role, ideally in an eCommerce or subscription-based B2C environment
Open to: less years of analyst experience but prior experience working as a performance marketing manager and then turned into an analyst
Hands-on experience with Meta Ads Manager and other key platforms like Google, TikTok, and YouTube
Experience in bridging the gap between marketing and tech, particularly someone whoâ€™s been a performance marketer before transitioning into an analyst role, or someone with experience in a data team (e.g., Meta).
Strong passion for both marketing and analytics, with a problem-solving mindset and an eye for identifying growth opportunities.


Why Join Us?


Grow your marketing analytics skills while contributing to real-world business projects.
Work with data to help the business better understand and serve its customers.
Collaborate with a supportive team of cross-functional stakeholders.
Gain exposure to industry-standard tools and best practices in data analysis and marketing.
Be part of a company that values curiosity, learning, and continuous improvement.


What We Offer

ðŸŒŸImpact & purpose. The chance to join a huge mission and purpose around female empowerment & gender equality!

ðŸ¦¸ðŸ½â€â™€ï¸ Female-lead and women-centric. We have a female-centric product, a female CEO & Founder... and >90% of our whole team identifies as women+.

ðŸ¤Inspiring, highly performance oriented company culture. A progressive team culture based on transparency & open feedback, ownership, and collaboration. Check out 'radical candor' if you want to learn more about how we work.

ðŸ“ˆPersonal professional growth. The possibility to learn and grow with team learning sessions, learning & development budgets, and internal trainings - did you ever hear of a company where every team member (from junior to C-level) has access to personal 1:1 sessions with a professional business coach?

ðŸ”„Healthy approach to taking a break. 26 holidays + unlimited recharging time on top for when you really need a break.

ðŸ“ Flexibility. Flexible working hours and location - 2,5 months of remote working from wherever you want. 60% of our team is fully remote... and we bring everybody together for a week every 4 months to collaborate, connect, align, and have fun.

ðŸŽ‰ (Really cool) Events & Benefits like an Urban Sports Membership (or alternative offerings), snacks & lunches, mobility and retirement plans, and of course our famous femtasy parties & team events everybody keeps talking about for weeks (for real). We also cook and eat together twice per month and have a big office garden for the best BBQs in Berlin

ðŸ’ªPackage. A highly attractive compensation package which fairly mirrors what is expected from you and the impact you'll have on femtasy.

For remote applicants we consider only (CET Â±2h) within Europe. We do not offer relocation from within or outside the EU. Candidates ideally reside in Germany or Spain.

femtasy offers equal opportunities for all and encourages applicants of all nationalities, genders, sexual orientations, religious backgrounds, gender identities, and people with disabilities to apply.

Title: VIE Data Analyst
Description:
Transdev Group is hiring a VIE Data Analyst in Berlin, Germany

Mobility Company

At Transdev, we are proud to make 11 million people travel everyday around the world to efficient, simple and eco-friendly transport services that serve the territories.

Because we operate a wide range of transportation modes (Metro, Commuter Trains, LRT/ Tramways, Bus Rapid Transit, Buses, Coaches, ferries, etc.) and as we are established in 19 countries across five continents, everywhere we are, we aspire to promote the initiative of our multicultural teams.

Joining Transdev means joining men and women who serve others and work in a meaningful industry: mobility.

Destination/ Roadmap

You are an early talent with the personal project to kick start your career with an international assignment in a growing organization leader on its segments?

Transdev Group is looking for a V.I.E* Data Analyst to be based in Berlin in Germany.

In Germany from 1998, Transdev is the leading private rail passengerâ€™s operator and has helped to revitalize certain regions by deploying services that are better adapted to passengersâ€™ needs. We operate 20 Operation & Maintenance contracts, totalizing 55 million train km for 118 million passengers per year. The fleet is composed of 472 trainsets.


V.I.E is reserved for a specific category of individuals. Please visit the Business France website to ensure that you meet the eligibility criteria.


Responsibilities

The Data Analyst is responsible for:


Building data pipelines and maintaining existing ones
Programming in R and/or Python
Developing Web Apps using R Shiny
Providing various data related services for operational business units


Required Education and Experience:


University degree in STEM (Information services, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics) or related fields


Skills


Basic programming knowledge, SQL


Language


English full proficiency is required (B2)


Additional Information


Start date: 01/08/2025
Mission duration: 24 months
Location: Berlin, Germany
Reports to: Team Lead of Data Analytics Team

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Product Analytics
Description:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, travelers from over 170 countries have booked more than 200 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 700 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team Mission

The Analytics department's mission is to enable the organisation to take action based on data. We work on a variety of problems and datasets as members of cross-functional mission teams. We take ownership of the entire analytics funnel, from exploration through recommendations to impact measurement and take pride in the insights we generate.

As a Data Analyst in the Product Analytics team, you will help drive measurement, strategy, and tactical decision-making within GetYourGuide. You will solve problems that could range from understanding the relationship between review rating and conversion rate, figuring out how to measure adding videos to our product pages, what is the business value of an account login or developing a way to measure whether our customersâ€™ on trip experience is optimal.

Responsibilities


Develop quantitative analysis to drive product decisions.
Help the Search and Discovery group to learn about their features by designing and analyzing experiments.
Design and implement data models, metrics and dashboards to guide the teamsâ€™ product strategy and success.
Support the technical teams in tracking and producing more insightful data.
Contribute to the learning and experimentation culture of the company by promoting hypothesis-driven product development and evaluation.
Answer the big questions to push our knowledge of our customers further.
Contribute to the strategic thinking of the team by being a thought partner to the Product Manager.


Requirements


5+ years of relevant experience interpreting data in an analytics, data science or business intelligence role
Excellent stakeholder management skills.
Strong knowledge of SQL and knowledge of Python
Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks)
Curiosity, reasoning skills with proven evidence of problem solving.
Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers
Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction and with highly engaged individuals
Ability to navigate ambiguity.
Strong customer focus with a focus on business impact.
Great communication skills


Nice To Have


Previous experience working with agile product teams is a plus.
Previous experience managing analysts is a plus.
Experienced with the statistics and assumptions of experimentation.
Familiarity with ETL technologies like Airflow is a plus.
Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus.
Experience with LLM APIs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic) is a plus.


We Offer


Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences.
The opportunity to contribute to the
A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
English-speaking office environment
Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
Well-stocked kitchen and team-building events
GetYourGuide vouchers


And moreâ€¦

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.
Show more
HTML:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, travelers from over 170 countries have booked more than 200 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 700 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team Mission

The Analytics department's mission is to enable the organisation to take action based on data. We work on a variety of problems and datasets as members of cross-functional mission teams. We take ownership of the entire analytics funnel, from exploration through recommendations to impact measurement and take pride in the insights we generate.

As a Data Analyst in the Product Analytics team, you will help drive measurement, strategy, and tactical decision-making within GetYourGuide. You will solve problems that could range from understanding the relationship between review rating and conversion rate, figuring out how to measure adding videos to our product pages, what is the business value of an account login or developing a way to measure whether our customersâ€™ on trip experience is optimal.

Responsibilities

  • Develop quantitative analysis to drive product decisions.
  • Help the Search and Discovery group to learn about their features by designing and analyzing experiments.
  • Design and implement data models, metrics and dashboards to guide the teamsâ€™ product strategy and success.
  • Support the technical teams in tracking and producing more insightful data.
  • Contribute to the learning and experimentation culture of the company by promoting hypothesis-driven product development and evaluation.
  • Answer the big questions to push our knowledge of our customers further.
  • Contribute to the strategic thinking of the team by being a thought partner to the Product Manager.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of relevant experience interpreting data in an analytics, data science or business intelligence role
  • Excellent stakeholder management skills.
  • Strong knowledge of SQL and knowledge of Python
  • Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks)
  • Curiosity, reasoning skills with proven evidence of problem solving.
  • Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers
  • Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction and with highly engaged individuals
  • Ability to navigate ambiguity.
  • Strong customer focus with a focus on business impact.
  • Great communication skills

Nice To Have

  • Previous experience working with agile product teams is a plus.
  • Previous experience managing analysts is a plus.
  • Experienced with the statistics and assumptions of experimentation.
  • Familiarity with ETL technologies like Airflow is a plus.
  • Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus.
  • Experience with LLM APIs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic) is a plus.

We Offer

  • Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences.
  • The opportunity to contribute to the
  • A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
  • Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
  • English-speaking office environment
  • Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
  • Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
  • Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
  • Well-stocked kitchen and team-building events
  • GetYourGuide vouchers

And moreâ€¦

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.

Title: Senior Data Analyst, Growth Analytics
Description:
About GetYourGuide

GetYourGuide is the globally leading marketplace for unforgettable travel experiences. Travelers use GetYourGuide to discover the best things to do in a destination. Since its founding in 2009, travelers from over 170 countries have booked more than 200 million tours, activities, and attraction tickets through GetYourGuide. Powered by a global team of over 700 travel experts and technologists, we are headquartered in Berlin and have 17 local offices around the world. Visit our careers website to learn more.

Team mission

The Analytics department's mission is to enable the organisation to take action based on data. We work on a variety of problems and datasets as members of cross-functional mission teams. We take ownership of the entire analytics funnel, from exploration through recommendations to impact measurement and take pride in the insights we generate.

This Organic Growth Analytics team works with marketeers, analysts, product managers, data scientists and engineers to create and promote a best-in-class marketplace product. You will also collaborate closely with the Marketing Analytics team that focuses on paid acquisition channels to create an aligned holistic view. Your team will build an understanding of how to utilise our organic growth channels to the maximum capacity, and support the teams to reach their targets via operational and strategic insights, identifying opportunities and enabling proper measurement.

You Will


Develop quantitative analysis to drive product and marketing decisions.
In collaboration with stakeholders identify organic growth opportunities and dependencies.
Collaborate with marketing analytics and Growth cluster leads to develop a comprehensive understanding of user acquisition and retention channels.
Design and implement data models, metrics and dashboards to guide the teams strategy and success.
Support the technical teams in tracking and producing more insightful data.
Contribute to the learning and experimentation culture of the company by promoting hypothesis-driven development and evaluation.
Answer the big questions to push our knowledge of our customers further.
Contribute to the strategic thinking of the team by being a thought partner to the Product Managers and Marketing Leads.


Who You Are


5+ years of relevant experience interpreting data in an analytics, data science or business intelligence role
Excellent stakeholder management
Strong knowledge of SQL and experience with statistical packages (e.g. R, Python)
Strong statistical background and proficiency with advanced statistical methods
Experience with data visualization and reporting tools (e.g. Looker, Jupyter Notebooks)
Ability to understand user behavior and meaning behind the numbers, and translate them into actionable insights
Desire to work in an international environment, with minimal direction in ambiguous situations and with highly engaged individuals
Strong customer-centric mindset with a focus on business impact
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English


Nice To Have


Experience in SEO and CRM analytics, and with growth data products is of significant benefit.
Familiarity with ETL technologies like Airflow is a plus.
Experience with big data tools (e.g. Spark, Hive) is a plus.
Experience with LLM APIs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic) is a plus.


How We Set You Up For Success


Meaningful work that helps create memorable travel experiences
A diverse, inclusive environment where your voice is valued
Collaboration with smart, engaged colleagues from over 80 nationalities
English-speaking office environment
Continuous learning opportunities through monthly Hackathons, weekly tech talks, and an annual external training budget
Mentorship programs to support your growth and career development
Flexible working arrangements to support work-life balance
GetYourGuide vouchers and free German lessons
Relocation assistance if needed


And more...

We look forward to hearing from you

Unlock your full potential and join our mission to create unforgettable experiences for millions around the world. If you have the skills and passion for joining our team, we invite you to apply by submitting your CV/resume in English through the form below. Check out how we hire for tips and visibility into our process and check out life at GetYourGuide. If you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via jobs@getyourguide.com.

We are an equal opportunity employer

Our commitment is that every qualified person will be evaluated according to skills regardless of age, gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status, or religion. Please refrain from including your picture and age with the application.

Title: Trainee Data Analytics (w/m/d)
Description:
FÃ¼r unseren GeschÃ¤ftsbereich Transformation suchen wir dich zum nÃ¤chstmÃ¶glichen Zeitpunkt alsÂ Trainee Data Analytics (w/m/d).
Â 

Das erwartet dich

IndividualitÃ¤tÂ â€“ Mit einem fÃ¼r dich maÃŸgeschneiderten sechsmonatigen Ausbildungsplan wirst du optimal auf das Berufsfeld des Business-Analytics-Beraters im SAP-Umfeld vorbereitet. Teil des Traineeprogramms werden z.B. fachliche und technologische Trainings, Schulungen und Arbeitsmethoden sein, welche mit einer SAP-Zertifizierung abschlieÃŸen.

Analytics â€“Â Du leitest aus den GeschÃ¤ftsprozessen die Anforderungen an die Business-Analytics-LÃ¶sungen ab und entwickelst ganzheitliche Anwendungen. Unsere Beratungsteams begleiten in allen Phasen der Projektrealisierung: Von der Anforderungs- und Bedarfsanalyse Ã¼ber die Erstellung betriebswirtschaftlicher Konzepte, bis zur Realisierung und Implementierung.

BeratungsfunktionÂ â€“ Wir beraten unsere Kunden in den Themen rund um SAP Business and Analytics, SAP Business Intelligence, SAP S/4HANA (Embedded Analytics) und SAP HANA Cloud.

Datenanalyse â€“Â Mit Werkzeugen aus den Bereichen Big Data, Predictive Analytics, Business AI, Cloud Computing, Business Analytics und Business Intelligence deckst du das gesamte Spektrum der Datenanalyse ab.

Â 

Das bringst du mit

Â 

Dein Studium der (Wirtschafts-) Informatik, der Wirtschaftswissenschaften, des Ingenieurwesens, der Mathematik, der Statistik oder eines verwandten Fachbereichs hast du erfolgreich abgeschlossen oder stehst kurz davor.

Du bist begeistert davon, dich mit den Feldern Business and Analytics und Business AI auseinanderzusetzen und in diesem Umfeld LÃ¶sungen mit unseren Kunden zu entwickeln.

Idealerweise kannst du erste Erfahrungen in Form von Praktika oder WerkstundententÃ¤tigkeiten im Bereich Business and Analytics oder Business AI vorweisen.

Sehr gute Deutsch- und gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift bringst du mit.

Das Traineeprogramm startet zumÂ 01.10.2025.

Â

Title: Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
Description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,â€¯enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Our Purpose â€“ Bridging the World Through Travel

We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.

We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.

This role is based in Bangkok, Thailand, and is open to candidates worldwide. We offer a generous relocation package to ensure a smooth transition to living and working in Bangkok.

Get to Know our Team:

The Performance Marketing Team of Agoda is a world leader in online marketing. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. The marketing leadership at Agoda have deep experience in data science, product, strategy, and other marketing fields and have built an organization that thrives on data, creative ideas, and technology. The Performance Marketing Team also fosters a great learning environment. You will be able to learn and grow by working closely with experts from a variety of backgrounds from all over the world.

In this Role, youâ€™ll get to:


Search: Experiment with text ads, bidding, and campaign structures on Google, Bing, Baidu, Naver, and other search engines. Adapt to new product features and roll out changes from successful tests
Display: Test, analyze, and optimize campaigns on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and others
Modeling: Analyze the vast amounts of data generated by experiments, develop models we can use for optimization, and build dashboards for account managers


What youâ€™ll Need to Succeed:


Bachelorâ€™s Degree or higher from top university in a quantitative subject (computer science, mathematics, engineering, statistics or science)
Ability to communicate fluently in English
Exposure to one or more data analysis packages or databases, e.g., SAS, R, SPSS, Python, VBA, SQL, Tableau
Good numerical reasoning skills
Proficiency in Excel
Intellectual curiosity and analytical skills


Itâ€™s Great if you Have:


Experience in digital marketing
Academic research experience

Title: Senior Marketplace Analyst, Ride-hailing
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Product Analyst to join our Marketplace Rides team to help us improve and scale our pricing and matching algorithms that make millions of rides happen every day across 50+ countries!

About Us

With over 200 million customers in 50+ countries, Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa. And it's all thanks to our people.

We believe in creating an inclusive environment where everyone is welcome, regardless of race, colour, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, or disability.

Our ultimate goal is to make cities for people, not cars, and we need your help to achieve this mission!

About The Role

As a catalyst for discovery, you will boost current mechanics and contribute to new features in our pricing and matching domains. You will have an opportunity to apply your expertise in experimentation, causal inference and microeconomics to optimally match demand and supply.

In this role, you will develop and scale systems to improve the entire marketplace experience. These are truly unique problems to crack. Sounds interesting? Join us as a Senior Product Analyst and take a seat in our journey to revolutionise ride-hailing!

Your daily adventures will include:


Discovering new opportunities by conducting exploratory research and deep-diving into what drives our marketplace
Analysing feature performance, identifying points of improvement and designing new solutions based on your analysis
Owning and enforcing A/B testing best practices end-to-end, in other words validating features, designing & analysing experiments and making sure we take action
Designing relevant and actionable metrics to make better and faster decisions
Contributing to the conceptualisation and development of analytical solutions such as marketplace simulations or self-service data products
Closely collaborating with Product Managers, Engineers and Data Scientists to build, prioritise and execute our roadmap



About you:


You hold a Bachelor's and/or Master's degree in Economics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Management or similar studies
You have 3+ years of experience working in Product Analytics and/or Data Science
You rank your SQL skills as â€œoutstandingâ€ & Python/R skills as â€œprofoundâ€ and you have experience with some BI tools and data visualisation
You are fluent in English and your verbal and written communication is outstanding
You have a solid understanding of end-to-end A/B testing; experience with advanced experimentation such as switchback tests or other causal inference methods is an advantage
You are confident in applying basic notions of microeconomics in practice and have a basic understanding of supervised machine-learning models



Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you donâ€™t tick every box, please consider applying if you feel youâ€™re the kind of person described above!

Why youâ€™ll love it here:


Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50 countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location.

Title: Lead (Principal) BI Analyst - Revenue & Commercial (all genders)
Description:
Company Description

About us

The AVIV Group is one of the worldâ€™s largest digital real estate tech businesses. AVIVâ€™s unique family of leading brands include some of Europeâ€™s best-known digital real estate classified companies: Groupe SeLoger and Meilleurs Agents (France), Immowelt Group (Germany), Immoweb (Belgium) and Yad2 (Israel). The AVIV Group invests in new and exciting business models that will shape the future of how consumers will buy, sell, rent or lend properties markets across Europe. Headquartered in Berlin, AVIV Group is proud to be supported by 2000 co-workers across France, Germany, Belgium and Israel.

Job Description

As Lead Commercial and Revenue Data Analyst, you will use advanced analytical skills to solve various problems facing the business. You will play a critical role in championing the use of data to drive revenue growth from our products and services.

You will be part of the Analytics team and work specifically for the Commercial and Pricing teams. You will work closely with the Commercial and Pricing teams to prioritize tasks, ensuring that the data you prepare addresses their specific questions. Additionally, you will collaborate with them to provide valuable insights, recommendations, and strategies that align with commercial goals and drive business success.

Your approach to achieving these objectives will vary from day to day. One day, you may be setting the strategic direction for key initiatives, the next you could be analyzing data and identifying trends to uncover insights, and on another day, you might focus on improving operational processes to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Your role will require flexibility and the ability to adapt to evolving business needs while maintaining a focus on driving revenue growth. You need to be technically skilled and comfortable with spending time on data preparation, cleaning, and codingâ€”particularly in SQLâ€”since only clean data can deliver meaningful and reliable insights.

Your Responsibilities


Own the end-to-end data pipeline, ensuring that data is efficiently extracted, cleaned, and structured before analysis. Use SQL to query large datasets, optimize performance, and ensure data accuracy. Apply common data definitions to maintain consistency across reports and analyses, ensuring alignment with business metrics.
Support the While Label migration process by maintaining legacy data requirements, ensuring data continuity, and helping design the optimal structure for future revenue analytics.
Understand revenue performance and opportunities â€“ Monitor trends in customer behavior and spending, analyze root causes, identify risks, and deliver actionable recommendations.
Design analytical solutions â€“ Work with the Commercial Finance team and other senior stakeholders to turn business questions into clearly scoped analytical projects.
Deliver analytical projects end-to-end â€“ Ensure work is robust, accurate, and delivered in a timely manner.
Communicate results to drive impact â€“ Share insights and results in a commercial and compelling manner, with strong data visualization.
Build strong cross-functional relationships â€“ Collaborate with leaders across Sales, Marketing, Customer Experience, Finance, Product, and other supporting teams.
Provide support and oversight to strategic projects.


Qualifications

Your Profile


Over 7 years of relevant experience in an analytical role, with a demonstrated ability to translate data insights into business impact.
You have analytics skills and have experience on the following aspects:
Business Intelligence: extensive professional experience in the field of data analysis, business intelligence, or analytics engineering
Relational databases: expertise in working with relational databases
AWS Athena familiarity: strong proficiency in working with AWS Athena, including the ability to efficiently query large datasets stored in S3 using SQL
Advanced knowledge of SQL: deep understanding of advanced SQL techniques for complex data analysis
Dashboarding and data Visualisation: skilled in creating interactive and visually appealing dashboards using Tableau for effective data presentation
Python for Data Analytics: proficiency in Python for data analytics, enhancing the ability to automate processes and perform advanced analyses
Strong analytical thinker, with success in uncovering and building business cases for new growth opportunities. Ability to apply effective financial and analytical frameworks.
You possess a keen attention to detail, ensuring the accuracy and precision of data analysis and reporting
Strong track record of working with senior leaders and collaborating cross-functionally.
Ability to operate in an unstructured, fast-paced environment. Must show resilience and prioritize effectively in an evolving landscape.
Strong intellectual curiosity, combining analytical skills, pragmatism, and strategic vision.
You are solution-oriented and able to take initiative independently
Ability to communicate effectively with international cross functional teams (fluency in English is required)

  • Over 7 years of relevant experience in an analytical role, with a demonstrated ability to translate data insights into business impact.
  • You have analytics skills and have experience on the following aspects:
    • Business Intelligence: extensive professional experience in the field of data analysis, business intelligence, or analytics engineering
    • Relational databases: expertise in working with relational databases
    • AWS Athena familiarity: strong proficiency in working with AWS Athena, including the ability to efficiently query large datasets stored in S3 using SQL
    • Advanced knowledge of SQL: deep understanding of advanced SQL techniques for complex data analysis
    • Dashboarding and data Visualisation: skilled in creating interactive and visually appealing dashboards using Tableau for effective data presentation
    • Python for Data Analytics: proficiency in Python for data analytics, enhancing the ability to automate processes and perform advanced analyses
  • Strong analytical thinker, with success in uncovering and building business cases for new growth opportunities. Ability to apply effective financial and analytical frameworks.
  • You possess a keen attention to detail, ensuring the accuracy and precision of data analysis and reporting
  • Strong track record of working with senior leaders and collaborating cross-functionally.
  • Ability to operate in an unstructured, fast-paced environment. Must show resilience and prioritize effectively in an evolving landscape.
  • Strong intellectual curiosity, combining analytical skills, pragmatism, and strategic vision.
  • You are solution-oriented and able to take initiative independently
  • Ability to communicate effectively with international cross functional teams (fluency in English is required)

Title: eCommerce Data Analyst â€“ Sales, Pricing, Forecasting (m/f/d)
Description:
Your role:

As subtelâ€™s first dedicated Data Analyst, you will take full ownership of analytics across sales, pricing, inventory, and competition. You will design dashboards, forecasting models, and reporting pipelines based on a new raw data foundation (single source of truth), directly supporting commercial decisions and revenue growth. You will report to the Category Lead and work closely with our Data Engineer.




Your Responsibilities:

Build and maintain Power BI dashboards integrated with Microsoft Fabric.
Deliver sales forecasts, pricing models, and competitor analyses to drive business actions.
Automate reporting workflows and define scalable data models.
Set and document best practices for data access, quality, and reporting across teams.




Our Environment:

Microsoft Fabric setup based on a consolidated single source of truth.
Dashboards and models to be created new, with significant freedom to design architecture and logic.
High direct business impact with visibility across the company.




Your Profile:

Degree in Data Analytics, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related quantitative field.
2+ years' experience in Data Analytics (preferably eCommerce, Retail, or FMCG).
Advanced Power BI, Power Query, DAX/M, and Excel skills.
Solid understanding of data modeling, joins, aggregations, and reporting logic.
Fluent English (written and spoken).




Nice to Have:

Python (pandas), and SQL skills.
Experience with Azure environments for data analytics.
Familiarity with A/B testing and interpreting business experiments.




What We Offer:

Full ownership of the analytics function.
Clear path to Lead Analyst role as the team evolves.
Direct impact on commercial strategy and execution.

Title: Working Student Business Intelligence (m/f/x)
Description:
We are MYNE Homes - the smartest way to own your dream holiday property. With our innovative Co-Ownership offering, we provide more people with the opportunity to fulfill their dream of owning a vacation home. Founded by serial entrepreneurs and supported by some of the most renowned business angels in Europe (e.g. founders of Auto1, Smava, and Numa), we are growing rapidly and are looking for you to help us build the next Proptech Unicorn!




As a Working Student Business Intelligence (m/f/x) you will support our marketing teams' super users while gaining valuable experience in a dynamic business environment. This position offers an excellent opportunity to develop practical skills in data analysis, business intelligence, and marketing analytics.


Tasks



Become a full member of the BI team from day one, with full access to our data warehouse and all relevant tools


Support our marketing teamsâ€™ super users with data analysis, reporting, and weekly insights


Learn and adapt to new tools and technologies, staying close to business developments as they happen


Take on more responsibility over time and contribute to code reviews as your experience grows



Requirements



You are currently enrolled in Economics, Business Informatics, Computer Science, or a similar field


You are enrolled at a Berlin university with at least 12 months remaining until your thesis


You are available to work 16â€“20 hours per week, ideally on 2â€“3 regular weekdays


You are eager to learn quickly and adapt in a dynamic environment


You are proficient in G-Sheets and Excel, and comfortable using functions like VLOOKUP and pivot tables


You are fluent in English with good to very good proficiency in German





Even better if:





You have initial experience with SQL, dbt, and/or version control tools like Git


You're familiar with performance marketing channels such as Google Ads, Meta, or similar platforms


You've worked in fast-paced environments like startups, consulting, investment banking, or private equity internships



Benefits



The opportunity to actively build and shape one of the leading proptech start-ups.


You will work directly with experienced founders and high-profile investors from the technology and real estate worlds.


Responsible and varied tasks with scope for your own ideas.


A motivated and results-oriented team, flat hierarchies and short decision-making processes.


Competitive salary and the usual start-up benefits.


And, of course, stays in our dream holiday properties!





Are you open-minded, highly motivated and interested in the real estate market? Then we look forward to receiving your application!

Title: Senior Marketplace Analyst, Ride-hailing
Description:
We are looking for an experienced Senior Product Analyst to join our Marketplace Rides team to help us improve and scale our pricing and matching algorithms that make millions of rides happen every day across 50+ countries!




About Us

With over 200 million customers in 50+ countries, Bolt is one of the fastest-growing tech companies in Europe and Africa. And it's all thanks to our people.




We believe in creating an inclusive environment where everyone is welcome, regardless of race, colour, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, or disability.




Our ultimate goal is to make cities for people, not cars, and we need your help to achieve this mission!




About The Role

As a catalyst for discovery, you will boost current mechanics and contribute to new features in our pricing and matching domains. You will have an opportunity to apply your expertise in experimentation, causal inference and microeconomics to optimally match demand and supply.




In this role, you will develop and scale systems to improve the entire marketplace experience. These are truly unique problems to crack. Sounds interesting? Join us as a Senior Product Analyst and take a seat in our journey to revolutionise ride-hailing!




Your daily adventures will include:

Discovering new opportunities by conducting exploratory research and deep-diving into what drives our marketplace
Analysing feature performance, identifying points of improvement and designing new solutions based on your analysis
Owning and enforcing A/B testing best practices end-to-end, in other words validating features, designing & analysing experiments and making sure we take action
Designing relevant and actionable metrics to make better and faster decisions
Contributing to the conceptualisation and development of analytical solutions such as marketplace simulations or self-service data products
Closely collaborating with Product Managers, Engineers and Data Scientists to build, prioritise and execute our roadmap




About you:

You hold a Bachelor's and/or Master's degree in Economics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Information Management or similar studies
You have 3+ years of experience working in Product Analytics and/or Data Science
You rank your SQL skills as â€œoutstandingâ€ & Python/R skills as â€œprofoundâ€ and you have experience with some BI tools and data visualisation
You are fluent in English and your verbal and written communication is outstanding
You have a solid understanding of end-to-end A/B testing; experience with advanced experimentation such as switchback tests or other causal inference methods is an advantage
You are confident in applying basic notions of microeconomics in practice and have a basic understanding of supervised machine-learning models




Experience is great, but what we really look for is drive, intelligence, and integrity. So even if you donâ€™t tick every box, please consider applying if you feel youâ€™re the kind of person described above!




Why youâ€™ll love it here:

Play a direct role in shaping the future of mobility.
Impact millions of customers and partners in 600+ cities across 50 countries.
Work in fast-moving autonomous teams with some of the smartest people in the world.
Accelerate your professional growth with unique career opportunities.
Get a rewarding salary and stock option package that lets you focus on doing your best work.
Enjoy the flexibility of working in a hybrid mode.
Take care of your physical and mental health with our wellness perks.
Some perks may differ depending on your location.

Title: Senior Data Analyst/Consultant (m/w/d), Berlin
Description:

Unser Anspruch ist es, unseren Kunden moderne, schlanke, leistungsfÃ¤hige und cloud-basierte "State of the Art"-LÃ¶sungen bereitzustellen, die einerseits genau ihre aktuellen Erfordernisse bedienen, andererseits auch die Grundlage fÃ¼r ein weiteres datenbasiertes Wachstum bieten. Dazu bleiben wir am Puls der Entwicklung aktueller Tools und Technologien und investieren auch in eigene Innovationsprojekte.




Als Beratungsunternehmen unterstÃ¼tzen wir unsere Kunden in allen Data- & Analytics-Bereichen, angefangen von der Datenakquise/Tracking Ã¼ber das Data-Engineering/DWH bis hin zu Business Analytics und Predictive Analysis. Als Berater bist du einerseits Generalist, um unsere Kunden entlang des gesamten Data-Stacks beraten zu kÃ¶nnen, andererseits hast du auch eine Spezialisierung in einem der Bereiche.


Aufgaben



Du entwickelst fÃ¼r unsere Kunden moderne, nutzerorientierte Data-Stacks.


Du bist fÃ¼r eigene Projekte verantwortlich, berÃ¤tst Kunden technisch und strategisch und findest selbststÃ¤ndig die fÃ¼r ihre GeschÃ¤ftsmodelle optimale Data & Analytics-LÃ¶sung.


Du steuerst ggf. Mitarbeiter in den Projekten.


Du hilfst unseren Kunden GeschÃ¤ftsprozesse und Produkte zu verbessern indem du wichtige Kennzahlen erkennst, erfasst und analysierst. Du erstellst dafÃ¼r Dashboards und Deep Dives und berÃ¤tst Kunden bei datenbasierten GeschÃ¤ftsentscheidungen.


Als Teil eines jungen wachsenden Teams sammelst du kontinuierlich wertvolle Erfahrung in unterschiedlichen GeschÃ¤ftsmodellen, oder neuen Tools und Methoden


Du hilfst uns, 9 friendly white rabbits zu einer fÃ¼hrenden Data-Consultancy in Berlin und Deutschland auszubauen.



Qualifikation



Du hast den Anspruch zu den Besten in deinem Gebiet zu gehÃ¶ren und bewertest und adaptierst stÃ¤ndig neue Technologien und Methoden im Bereich Data & Analytics


Du hast 4-7 Jahre Erfahrung im Aufbau und Betrieb von modernen, anspruchsvollen und nutzerorientierten Data & Analytics LÃ¶sungen in einem Unternehmensumfeld, idealerweise in 3 oder mehr unterschiedlichen Projekten


Tiefgehende Erfahrungen in zumindest einigen der folgenden Technologien und ein generelles VerstÃ¤ndnis der anderen: Analytics (z.B. Data Studio, Tableau, Metabase, Looker, R, Python/pandas, PowerBI, SQL); Tracking (z.B. Tag Manager, Javascript, HTML, REST-API, Google Analytics, Piwik); ETL/DWH (z.B. BigQuery, Snowflake, MS Fabric, Redshift, SQL, Looker, dbt, Talend, airflow); ML (pandas, scikit learn, keras, tensorflow, BigQuery ML)


Du hast ein starkes analytisches DenkvermÃ¶gen und ein strukturelles Herangehen an Code- und Datenstrukturen und Interesse an wirtschaftlichen ZusammenhÃ¤ngen


Du bringst Sachen zu Ende und achtest auf QualitÃ¤t und Usability


Du hast groÃŸen SpaÃŸ an Internettechnologien und bist offen fÃ¼r Neues


Reisebereitschaft, hauptsÃ¤chlich arbeiten wir jedoch remote von Berlin aus


Sehr gute Deutsch- && Englischkenntnisse, schriftlich und mÃ¼ndlich (Must-Have)


Erfahrungen aus einem Agentur oder Beratungsumfeld sind ein Plus



Benefits



Wir bieten Dir einen abwechslungsreichen Arbeitsalltag mit viel Gestaltungsspielraum als Teil eines jungen, enthusiastischen Teams mit flachen Hierarchien und Startup-AtmosphÃ¤re


Unbefristete Anstellung mit attraktiver VergÃ¼tung


Auch zukÃ¼nftig hybrides Arbeitsmodell mit Team-Office-Tagen und Homeoffice


Flexible Zeiteinteilung/Gleitzeit


Modernes, gut zu erreichendes BÃ¼ro in Berlin (am Antonplatz), GetrÃ¤nke und Obst inklusive, MacBook Pro


Wir bieten Dir Raum fÃ¼r fachliche und persÃ¶nliche Weiterbildung


MÃ¶glichkeit der Mitarbeit an In-House Innovationsprojekten


Einstellungstermin: Q1, flexibel, ggf. auch kurzfristiger





Genau das was Du suchst? Dann melde dich unkompliziert mit einem kurzen Motivations/Bewerbungsschreiben und einem Lebenslauf/LinkedIn/Xing-Profil hier Ã¼ber die Plattform.

Title: Internship: Data Scientist - Quantitative Investment Research (m/f/d)
Description:
Your Mission

This internship provides you with the opportunity to become part of our Asset Allocation Team with a focus on data science for quantitative investment strategies.

The Asset Allocation Team identifies relative performance opportunities in international multi-asset markets for tactical portfolio decisions. Applying Machine Learning to Asset Pricing problems helps us to discover non-linear relationships between the macroeconomic environment, market sentiment, and systemic risk.

During your internship, you will work closely with our specialists in quant finance and machine learning engineering. Within our supportive team environment you will have the opportunity to take ownership and full end-to-end responsibility.

Your tasks


Work intensively on the development and continuous enhancement of our cutting-edge, ML-based, systematic investment strategies as part of our Asset Allocation Team
Be involved in the further development and implementation (e.g., conducting experiments as well as evaluations) of our hypothesis-driven research agenda along key building blocks (e.g., data, transformations, model(s), targets) relevant for product performance
Work closely with our senior quant finance and machine learning experts
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code in Python


Your Skillset


Currently pursuing a degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, or Economics/Finance with quantitative focus
Solid knowledge of data analytics in Python as well as corresponding state-of-the-art tools and frameworks
Experience in working with data, building quantitative models, data-driven decision-making
Strong foundation in or willingness to learn software engineering principles, and a commitment to developing high-quality code that aligns with industry best practices
Proactive and independent workstyle
Strong interpersonal skills and a real passion for working in a team environment
Passion for quantitative investing
Fluent in spoken and written English, good communication skills
Bonus: Proficiency with Git, the distributed version control system thatâ€™s integral to collaborative coding endeavors


Why us?


An exciting and involving role with significant impact on shaping the future of AI-based sustainable investing
A company culture that is based on a spirit of cooperation and is characterized by a high level of quality awareness, openness and attention to detail in all areas of our work
The opportunity to work in an interdisciplinary team with our experienced quant finance, software engineering and machine learning experts
A modern loft office in Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg, healthy food (including coffee, juices, fruit, vegetables, sandwiches) and high-end hardware from Apple
Internal workshops, unique learning possibilities across a wide range of domains as well as amazing team events
Benefits such as Urban Sports Club or Fitness First as well as corporate benefits


About Us

We are a deep tech pioneer, providing AI-based investment solutions to our clients. Building on the best practices of quantitative asset management we tap the potential of machine learning for sustainable investments on capital market.

Our interdisciplinary team consists of experts in the fields of finance, computer science, software engineering, machine learning as well as mathematics, physics, and neuroscience. Ultramarin is embedded in the global AI community, through a close exchange with leading universities and as a member of Inquire Europe.

To date Ultramarin is one of the leading drivers for AI-based analyses and decision-making processes in asset management. Ultramarin has been founded in 2017, is headquartered in Berlin, with additional locations in Frankfurt and Munich, and is backed by leading international business angels and VCs.

Title: Senior / Staff Data Analyst (Pricing)
Description:
Our mission? Creating the freedom for SMEs to succeed in business and beyond, by delivering Europeâ€™s leading finance workspace. We combine business-class tools (seamless invoicing, spend management, and pre-accounting) with unwaveringly attentive 24/7 support, designed to help businesses breeze through all things finance.

Our journey: Founded by Alexandre and Steve in July 2017, Qonto has rapidly gained trust, serving over 500,000 customers. Thanks to our wonderful team of 1,600+ Qontoers, we also made it to the LinkedIn Top Companies French ranking!

Our values:

Customer focus | Prioritize customers in everything you do

Ownership | Own your part, get things done

Teamwork | Make (team)work easy

Mastery | Continuously raise the bar

Integrity | Always do whatâ€™s right, and respect people

Our beliefs: At Qonto, we're committed to fostering a welcoming environment where everyone can thrive. We prioritize evaluating applicants based solely on skills and potential, ensuring diversity with 50% international team members, 44% women, and 20% parents. Join us in building a workplace that celebrates diversity and individuality.

Discover the steps we took to create a discrimination-free hiring process .

At Qonto, the Data department counts 50+ talents, including 4 talents in the Customer Analytics team for which we are hiring.

We seek a Senior/Staff Data Analyst (Pricing) who will report to Nicolas , Lead Customer Analytics, and collaborate cross-functionally with Paolo , driving the Pricing Strategy and executing Go-To-Market plans.

Your work will directly impact our financial performance and customer satisfaction across Europe.

ðŸ‘©â€ðŸ’»ðŸ§‘â€ðŸ’» As a Senior Pricing Data Analyst at Qonto, you will:


Establish Qontoâ€™s inaugural pricing analytics framework â€”defining processes, guidelines, and experimentation protocolsâ€”to support this newly created function . (e.g., build experiment protocols)
Analyze current pricing strategy and its impact (e.g. introduction of annual billing, introduction of modular offer)
Conduct A/B tests to optimize our pricing offers across our markets.
Deliver insights and impactful recommendations to Paoloâ€™s Pricing team to make educated pricing decisions.
Provide dashboards to monitor the performance of our experiments/new pricing decisions.


ðŸš€ What you can expect


A fast-growing European FinTech
A highly data-driven company with business stakeholders strongly committed to this mindset
Enjoy the synergy between Data and Business teams, fully aligned with Qontoâ€™s vision, ensuring your work has both impact and visibility
Work within a team that not only possesses great technical knowledge and comes from various backgrounds, bringing a rich diversity of skills to the table
Strong culture of knowledge-sharing practices and continuous improvement
Our data teams are part of our Tech department, granting us easy access to our infrastructures while also supporting teamwork


ðŸ¤ Your Future Manager

Your manager will be Nicolas , Lead Customer Analytics and you will be working very closely with Paolo , Head of Pricing & Packaging.

His background?

After his experience in the consulting world (BCG), Nicolas joined Qonto 2 years ago in our Data Science team, he then took the lead of the Customer Analytics team since its creation in January.

What does he bring to the team?

Nicolas has a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen, that helps the team drive impactful results. With 2 years at Qonto, he has an in-depth understanding of strategic initiatives and can help you navigate a multitude of topics (he already worked himself on some Pricing topics). He loves supporting & mentoring the team and fostering a collaborative environment!

ðŸ…About You


Expertise: You have 2+ years of expertise in data analysis and A/B testing in Pricing or Monetization, aimed at enhancing strategic business decisions in a similar Tech environment to Qonto. You master statistical and econometric methodologies.
Mastery: You can autonomously sort out and analyse data using SQL as well as Gsheet/Excel (Python/R is a plus), build interactive dashboards and select the right type of visualization to convey the message behind the data and, most importantly, to be actionable.
Customer Obsession: You are driven to solve high-impact business challenges and are committed to delivering solutions that create significant business value
Stakeholder management : You enjoy collaborating with business teams and possess effective communication skills. Beyond projects, offer your expertise in a consulting capacity to support our teams and C-levels on demand. Your quick, impactful interventions will help steer immediate decisions and strategies.
Language: You are fluent in English.


At Qonto we understand that true diversity isn't just about ticking boxes on a hiring checklist. Apply regardless of the boxes you tick! Who knows? You may have the missing piece of the puzzle we've been searching for all along.

ðŸŽ Perks

A tailor-made and dynamic career track. An inclusive work environment. And so much more to help you succeed.


Offices in Paris, Berlin, Milan, Barcelona, and Belgrade;
Tailor-made remote work policy depending on the job you apply for and where you live;
Competitive salary package;
A meal voucher;
Public transportation reimbursement (part or global);
A great health insurance (depending on the country);
Employee well-being initiatives: access to Moka Care to take care of your mental health and great offers for sports and wellness activities;
A progressive disability and parenthood policy (1 in 6 of Qonto employees is a parent!) and childcare benefits with selected partners;
Monthly team events.


ðŸ’¬ Our hiring process:


Interviews with your Talent Acquisition Manager and future managers
A remote exercise to demonstrate your skills and give you a taste of what working at Qonto could be like


Find more information about our interview process on our careers website .

On average our process lasts 20 working days and offers usually follow within 48 hours ðŸ¤ž

To learn more about us:

Qonto's Blog | Finanzbusiness | Tagesspiegel | Payment and Banking
